thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Novotel Beijing Peace, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: ElliePaige12
title: Great Location
text:
Really convenient location if you're visiting Beijing as a tourist. Located a couple of blocks away from the Wangfujing shopping area and the subway is only a couple of blocks away as well. Close to the Forbidden Palace, Tiananmen Square and Temple of Heaven.
The lobby of the hotel was really nice and the staff was able to provide guidance and recommendations fluently in English. The rooms seemed a bit dated but clean.
